doc:
Virginia Rappe https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virginia_Rappe 0 Virginia Rappe (; July 7, 1895 – September 9, 1921) was an American model and silent film actress. She worked mostly in small bit parts, and is best known for her death after attending a party with actor Roscoe "Fatty" Arbuckle, who was accused of complicity in her death, though ultimately exonerated. Virginia_Rappe ( ; July_7_,_1895 – September_9_,_1921 ) was an_American_model and silent_film_actress . She worked mostly in small_bit_parts , and is_best_known for her_death after attending a_party with actor_Roscoe_"_Fatty_"_Arbuckle , who was_accused of complicity in her_death , though ultimately exonerated .
